page.title: 03THE PICTS IN STRATHNAIRN
page.content: Long long ago when our strath was nearly all covered in trees people known as Picts thought of places to build forts on the top of big hills with steep cliffs on nearly all of the sides.Here they felt safe from their enemies. We have been to see a hill fort in square 02660831.It is on top of a very,very,very steep hill.I like hill climbing so I was good at climbing up to that hill fort but I am glad I was not fighting my way up. All the large boulders standing about showed us where the walls were.The defenders would have had an excellent view of their enemy coming up Strathnairn.The look out could warn those who lived in the farms around the fort. They had a well near the hill fort so could stay until it was safe.
